status: People tend to place a higher value on something when an authority figure approves of it. So if one or more of your customers are well known or authorities, make sure to feature those people on your website.
I just wanted to share a quick note and let you know that you guys do a really good job. I'm glad I decided to work with you. It's really great how easy your websites are to update and manage
The single most important thing is to make people happy. If you are making people happy, as a side effect, they will be happy to open up their wallets and pay you.
A customer talking about their experience with you is worth ten times that which you write or say about yourself.
